text.p: As an action, create a white hot flash. Creatures within close are blinded and stunned for 1 round if they fail a DC 9 CON check. Add a round of blindness on duplicate.
If this is an Ancestry Talent, then check to see if the following effect was already added to your Character Effects section.
If this is a Class Talent, then add the following effect to the Character Effects section of the Note tab and edit as needed.
